data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What are the benefits of exercise? Include specific examples in your answer."
data.answer: The first and most important reason for doing exercise is to help control weight and prevent obesity. Especially in hustle and bustle, junk food has become our main choice, which causes more calories than what our body can burn. Moreover, appropriate exercise will significantly reduce the opportunity and risk of diseases. For instance, my father has been running marathons for five years, and he has not been diagnosed with any serious diseases compared to his peers. Regular exercise also benefits mental health and mood in the long run, which enables us to get rid of the stress and depression accumulated in daily study and work. (105字)
